subject: United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer may face No. 4 Novak Djokovic and No. 5 Andy Roddick before a potential finals matchup with rivals Rafael Nadal or Andy Murray. The Williams sisters could meet in the semifinal.
snippet: Roger Federer may face No. 4 Novak Djokovic and No. 5 Andy Roddick before a potential finals matchup with rivals Rafael Nadal or Andy Murray. The Williams sisters could meet in the semifinal.
